documentation.text:
This contract allows a list of administrators to be tracked.  This list can then be enforced
on functions with administrative permissions.  Only the owner of the contract should be allowed
to modify the administrator list.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Calling account is not an administrator."

arguments.value: Calling account is not an administrator.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Calling account is not an administrator."

documentation.text: Function modifier to enforce administrative permissions.
Determine if the message sender is in the administrators list.

This contract allows a list of administrators to be tracked.  This list can then be enforced
on functions with administrative permissions.  Only the owner of the contract should be allowed
to modify the administrator list.

documentation.text: Remove an admin from the list.  This should only be callable by the owner of the contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addAdmin(address).notice: Add an admin to the list.  This should only be callable by the owner of the contract.

isAdministrator(address).notice: Determine if the message sender is in the administrators list.

removeAdmin(address).notice: Remove an admin from the list.  This should only be callable by the owner of the contract.

userdoc.notice: This contract allows a list of administrators to be tracked.  This list can then be enforced on functions with administrative permissions.  Only the owner of the contract should be allowed to modify the administrator list.
